name: sonica-beta
description: Sonic indications for lines over a specified limit

sonica.enabled.description: Determine if the extension is enabled

sonica.enablePanning.description: Determine if the cursor pans as you type

sonica.enableDiagnostics.description: Determine if diagnostic sounds are played when diagnostics are shown

sonica.volume.description: the volume of the cursor and rulers, in the range [0, 1]

scripts.compile: cd audio && cargo build --release && cp target/release/audio.exe .. && cd .. && webpack
scripts.package: cd audio && cargo build --release && cp target/release/audio.exe .. && cd .. && webpack --mode production --devtool hidden-source-map
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
